markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Read the Land](/Feats.aspx?ID=3001) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 213 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Geomancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=100)

**Prerequisites**
[Geomancer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2995); Master in [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

You've learned how to commune with the land to learn information. You learn the [_commune with nature_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=7) ritual if you didn't know it already. You can perform this ritual with a casting time of 1 hour instead of 1 day and without a secondary caster.
name: Read the Land
